title: Spyfall
description: A spy in your ranks wants to figure out where you are while everyone else is trying to figure out who the spy is.

roles.name: spy
roles.goal-description: Figure out where you are and don't get caught!

roles.name: Airplane
roles.goal-description: Figure out who the spy is and don't give away where you are!
